# ukc_volumes (Data Source)

Provides UUIDs of existing Unikraft Cloud volumes.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `states` (Set of String) Filter volumes based on their current [state](https://docs.kraft.cloud/006-rest-api-v1-volumes.html#volume-states)

### Read-Only

- `uuids` (List of String) List of volume UUIDs.
